data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the county of Kabeerdham to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Kabeerdham, Chhattisgarh, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 9,048 believers in Kabeerdham to start simple multiplying churches in their homes.

data.section_summary: On average, 66 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Kabeerdham, Chhattisgarh, India.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Spirit, help the church in the county of Kabeerdham do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Kabeerdham that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Lohar (Hindu traditions) people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Lohar (Hindu traditions) people know you.
God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 9,048 believers in Kabeerdham, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the disciples in Kabeerdham, Chhattisgarh, India to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Kabeerdham, Chhattisgarh, India.
